short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your OpenAI Chat experience with Zima, offering exporting, and search capabilities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zima - OpenAI Chat Companion is a Google Chrome extension, designed to elevate your experience on https://chat.openai.com/. With Zima, you can effortlessly manage, search, and explore your AI-powered chats. 

Key features include:

Download Chats: Export your conversations in JSON format, allowing you to save, share, or analyse them with ease.

Advanced Search: Quickly find previous chats with a powerful search functionality that helps you locate the conversations you need.

Local Storage: Securely store your chat history locally, ensuring that your conversations are always within reach.


We're committed to continuously improving Zima with new features and enhancements. Stay tuned for more exciting updates! Get started today and transform your OpenAI Chat experience with Zima - OpenAI Chat Companion.
